title: Ribbed wool and cashmere-blend cardigan
description: Allude's cardigan is made from a sumptuous blend of wool and cashmere and has chunky ribbed finish and wide collar that add to its cozy feel. Wear yours when the weather starts to cool, adjusting the zippered front as needed. Lower-Impact Materials. This product is made using at least 50% lower-impact materials or ingredients. Find out more about our NET SUSTAIN criteria here. Details & Care - Camel wool and cashmere-blend - Zip fastening through front - 70% virgin wool, 30% cashmere - Hand wash Size & Fit

title: One-shoulder wool and cashmere-blend sweater
